</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add backpack(s) to the cargo space of vehicle. MP synchronized. Classname list of available backpacks is [[ArmA 2 OA: Backpacks|here]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
___________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]] [packClassName, count] </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] to add the Backpack to </value></part><part><name>Parameter1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[this]] [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]] ["TK_RPG_Backpack_EP1", 2];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
